an10.155:4.1: “Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo na sevitabbo.
an10.155:4.3: Micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, micchāsaṅkappo hoti, micchāvāco hoti, micchākammanto hoti, micchāājīvo hoti, micchāvāyāmo hoti, micchāsati hoti, micchāsamādhi hoti, micchāñāṇī hoti, micchāvimutti hoti—
an10.155:4.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo na sevitabbo.
an10.155:5.1: Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo sevitabbo.
an10.155:5.3: Sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, sammāsaṅkappo hoti, sammāvāco hoti, sammākammanto hoti, sammāājīvo hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti, sammāsati hoti, sammāsamādhi hoti, sammāñāṇī hoti, sammāvimutti hoti—
an10.155:5.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo sevitabbo”ti.
